title: Tesla Model S Plaid
description: One of the fastest-accelerating production cars ever made. The tri-motor Plaid powertrain delivers hypercar-level performance in a practical luxury sedan.

title: Tesla Cybertruck
description: A radical reimagining of the pickup truck, featuring a nearly impenetrable stainless-steel exoskeleton, futuristic design, and versatile utility.

title: Tesla Model X Plaid
description: The quickest production SUV on the planet. It combines the utility of a three-row SUV and iconic Falcon Wing doors with the absurd acceleration of the Plaid powertrain.

title: Tesla Model 3 Performance
description: The track-ready version of the popular Model 3. It offers sports car handling and blistering acceleration, making it a dominant force in the compact electric sedan segment.

title: Tesla Model Y Performance
description: The high-performance variant of the world's best-selling electric crossover. It blends family-friendly practicality with supercar-like speed and agility.

title: Tesla Roadster
description: The upcoming next-generation hypercar promising record-shattering performance, including unprecedented acceleration, top speed, and range for an electric vehicle.

title: Tesla Model S
description: The flagship sedan that revolutionized the EV industry. It continues to set the standard for long-range electric travel, minimalist luxury, and cutting-edge technology.

title: Tesla Model X
description: The premium electric SUV known for its iconic Falcon Wing doors, expansive interior, and top-tier safety ratings, making it a unique choice for families.

title: Tesla Model 3 Long Range
description: The most popular version of the Model 3, offering an exceptional balance of extensive driving range, brisk performance, and advanced tech in an accessible package.

title: Tesla Model Y Long Range
description: The best-selling version of the Model Y, providing ample range, versatile cargo space, and all-wheel drive, making it the ideal all-around electric family crossover.
